description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. Fast paced space shooter up to 4 players in co-op mode featuring LIVE! High Scores allowing you to compete with your friends. YASS is a classic but innovative side scrolling game playable in 3 different difficulties to match your gaming needs in full. Try to survive till the last level making your way through enemies, bosses and meteors enjoying a beautiful set of SFX!
